document_data.name: ''Crown of Scholarship''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''crown of scholarship''''' was an [[enchanted]] hat worn by scholars and [[wizard]]s. It could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], and specifically within [[Blackstaff Academy]].
document_data.Description: A "''crown''" was a regal scholar's cap with [[gold]] trim.
document_data.Powers: Wearing a ''crown of scholarship'' enhanced one's ability to study mysteries and tackle [[arcane]] challenges. In combat, it was said to be usable by wizards to help them or their allies deduce the best way to strike at foes as well as how to conceal their own strengths.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Vajra Safahr]], the [[Blackstaff]] of Waterdeep during the late 15{{th}} century DR, was said to don a ''crown of scholarship'' whenever she got excited about a new intriguing question.
